alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewiston Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 10:08AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FREEZING RAIN WILL AFFECT LATAH...NORTHERN NEZ PERCE...SHOSHONE... NORTHERN LEWIS...BENEWAH...EASTERN KOOTENAI AND NORTHEASTERN ASOTIN COUNTIES... At 903 AM PST, an area of light freezing rain was located 7 miles northwest of Bovill, or 25 miles south of St. Maries, moving northeast at 15 mph. Additional light showers of freezing rain will develop behind the main band. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Moscow, St. Maries, Kellogg, Pinehurst, Osburn, Lapwai, Wallace, Plummer, Genesee, Troy, Potlatch, Mullan, Smelterville, Juliaetta, Deary, Culdesac, Kendrick, Bovill, and Wardner. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 24 and 73 from Coeur D Alene to Lookout Pass, U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between Lewiston and Coeur D Alene, and between U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 2 and 34. The freezing rain may quickly coat untreated roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. &&
